item.title: Re: Max Kaiju Damage
item.content:encoded:
If you have the strength for auto pass on difficulty then the #1 kaiju rule applies: More levels=more damage.

If you ARE going for Terri points, then use the following teams:

Gen- Terri 3/Threads/Flutie (swap for Touchy if you can)
Nin- Terri 3/Palmface/Sticky (swap for Rayne if you can)
Tai- Terri 3/Chunks/Tubby (swap for Grandmaster P if you can)

If you ARE NOT going for Terri points and just for damage, then use the following teams:

Gen- Threads/Flutie/Blind Fury (swap for Touchy if you can)
Nin- Palmface/Sticky/Blind Fury (swap for Rayne if you can)
Tai- Chunks/Tubby/Blind Fury (swap for Grandmaster P if you can)

Other things that help

  • Terri's Sickel Weasel summon - 3 stamina back per attack
  • Warrior of Wisdom (Gen) - 5 stam back per attack
  • Warrior of Courage (Nin) - 5 stam back per attack
  • Warrior of Power (Tai) - 5 stam back per attack
  • Lab Coat - 5 stam back per attack
  • Tsukiballs - 5 stam back per attack
  • Tire Tracks - 10 stam back per attack
  • Poisoned Daggars - 5 extra successes per attack
  • Bring Down the House Jutsu - 5 extra successes per attack (Try to refine all the way down)

Then of course some kaiju are hurt by certain perm items you have like regalia, ninja puppet, etc.

item.title: Re: Max Kaiju Damage
item.content:encoded:
I usually use Terri 3, Wasteland 8 range/level, and Emosuke (If it's a high range, and if I don't have Strawberry 3 yet)

Having the warrior of wisdom/courage/power items from the arena are useful.

Using Terri's summon, sickle weasel, gives you +3 stamina per attack, which is kinda useful.

item.title: Max Kaiju Damage
item.content:encoded:
I've heard a few suggestions for teams, using juice and all that- But I'm interested to know what everyone's strategies are for doing serious damage to the Kaiju.

I've been using Terri 3/8 Level + Range Wasteland/ 6 Level Wasteland allies, but haven't been too successful.
Some guy in my village is hitting 3500+ damage in 14 attacks, and I can't even hope to deal much more than 2500 using 5 Terri Twists.

So, what are your strategies like? :3
